meta.script: function waitForTranslateToDisplay(selector, time) { if(document.querySelector(selector)!=null) { var translate = document.getElementsByClassName("goog-te-combo")[0]; translate.setAttribute("aria-label", "Select language for translation");} else {setTimeout(function() { waitForTranslateToDisplay(selector, time);}, time);}}

h3.a: District Employees - Families First Coronavirus Response Act »

div.p: District employees: Please see the below information from the United States Department of Labor:
Brookfield Families, Our E-Learning Site is now active! Please visit the following site for EVERYTHING you need...
This page will be continually updated with district-wide and school communications, information, resources, and more...

100 Pocono Road, Brookfield, CT 06804 (203) 775-7700
Website Disclaimer Websites by CivicPlus ®
